able to lift 5-10 lbs., access areas throughout the hospital

Shift

Nights â€“ will work three 12 hour, 7PM-730AM SHIFTS /week. Plus, 4 hours per week to attend administrative / service line meetings.

Will also work weekends and holidays as required

Job Summary

The HOA is responsible for daily operations, continuous throughput, oversight of patient care, service, policy enforcement and leadership for hospital operations. The HOA serves as a facilitator for staff in matters related to equipment, supplies, personnel issues, media requests, customer service, and patient satisfaction.

Effective interpersonal relationships are essential in all activities.

Skills / Knowledge / Abilities

Strong communication skills both oral and written, leadership skills, management, broad clinical knowledge, critical thinking skills, prioritization/ organizational skills, ability to multi task, resource management, conflict management, service excellence, resource management, high level problem solving, crisis management.

Does this position have supervisory responsibilities?  No

Preferred Education/Experience

MSN and prior patient care management experience preferred

Deadline to Apply 04/21/2024
